thread.title: Portuguese League Cup final between Braga and Moreirense marred by players being hit by firecrackers thrown from stands
thread.title_full: Portuguese League Cup final between Braga and Moreirense marred by players being hit by firecrackers thrown from stands

author: sstreet
title: Portuguese League Cup final between Braga and Moreirense marred by players being hit by firecrackers thrown from stands
text:
EFL Pyro shame Portuguese League Cup final between Braga and Moreirense marred by players being hit by firecrackers thrown from stands 
Object appeared to be thrown by Braga fans as Moreirense's players celebrated taking a shock lead Video Comments TWO players have been hit with a firecracker during the Portuguese League Cup final. 
The object appeared to be thrown by angry Braga fans after Moreirense took a shock lead in Faro. 4 Two Moreirense players fell to the ground after a firecracker exploded next to them 
Caue converted a penalty for the underdogs on the stroke of half time and thatâ€™s when the trouble started. 
Striker Roberto Rodrigo was one of the players to go down after the firecracker exploded near him. 
Moreirense ultimately held out to win their first ever trophy and seal a fairytale ending to their campaign. Flares are thrown at players during the Braga vs Moreirense game in Portugal EPA Roberto Rodrigo goes down after the firecracker exploded in his face Getty Images Moreirense celebrate their winning goal BT Sport 4 A firecracker was thrown towards Sergio Romero in a similar incident when Man United played away to Zorya Luhansk 
On their way to winning the cup, they beat two of the country's big three in Porto and Benfica. 
In a similar incident, a firecracker thrown by Zorya Luhansk fans narrowly missed Man United goalkeeper Sergio Romero during a Europa League match in Ukraine. 10 amazing things you didn't know about Real Madrid and Portugal superstar Cristiano Ronaldo
